input_data.prompt_to_llm:
The following financial transaction passed all fraud checks and no unusual patterns were detected. Please generate a concise (2-3 sentences) and reassuring narrative explaining this. Do not include a conversational opening or closing. Focus on clarity and professionalism.

Transaction details: ID 35bd1a54-51ae-47e4-9dbf-8ca1dee798d9, Amount $150.00, Card Type credit, User Location USA, Merchant Amazon, Merchant Location USA.

description: The transaction with ID 35bd1a54-51ae-47e4-9dbf-8ca1dee798d9 was successfully processed and cleared our fraud detection system without any unusual patterns or red flags. The transaction amount of $150.00 was made using a credit card with a valid User Location in the USA and was processed through a reputable merchant, Amazon, with a location also in the USA. This transaction has been deemed legitimate and authorized for payment.
